{{lead.First Name:default=About this Whitepaper}}:
In The Need for Automated Service Assurance in Virtualized Data Centers <http://bit.ly/1iVswwD>, virtualization guru Bernd Harzog (Analyst, Virtualization and Cloud Performance Management at The Virtualization Practice) unpacks two fundamental changes facing enterprise IT today:
- The accelerating development and deployment of elastic, business-agile applications & - The imperative of effectively managing the virtualized and cloud infrastructures onto which these fast applications are deployed
Harzog contends that as enterprise IT continually evolves along each of these dimensions, Automated Service Assurance (ASA) will be paramount for any organization wishing to thrive in the future.
Read the report today <http://bit.ly/1iVswwD> to control your tomorrow.
Holistically, VMTurbo
